concept.title: Using Euca2ools
concept.shortdesc: Introduction to the most common Eucalyptus tasks: view the status of resources, create necessary keypairs, run and instance, log in to that instance, and terminate the instance.

conbody.p: Now that you have created a user account, obtained credentials, and set your environment variables by sourcing the eucarc configuration file, you are ready to upload and run VM instances in your Eucalyptus cloud.
